mdRecord.dcterms:title: A plan of New York Island, and part of Long Island, with the circumjacent country, as far as Dobbs's Ferry to the north, and White Plains to the east, including the rivers, islands, roads, &ca : also shewing the landing, routes, battles, lines and encampments of the British forces under the command of His Excellency Sir William Howe Knight of the most honorable Order of the Bath, Commander in Chief &ca. &ca. &ca
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Blaskowitz, Charles
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Campaign headquarters map showing military features and events in the New York area from June to November 1776.
